sentence.Network_en: Did you see the shameless way she was chucking herself at him?
sentence.Network_cn: 你看她涎皮赖脸地追求他了 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: He blarneys the ladies with the most shameless lies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用最无耻的谎言向那些女士们谄媚.

sentence.Network_en: He's shameless about his cheating and lying.
sentence.Network_cn: 他欺骗、说谎,却不以为耻.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《无耻之徒》（shameless）是收费电视台Showtime于今年1月9日推出的一部翻拍自同名英剧的剧集，试播集即以98.2万的收视率创 …
《无耻家庭》（Shameless）S03E12《Survival of the Fittest》XF+Zyv.A0 在季终集里，Fiona和家人准备举办一个特别聚会来庆祝Li…
But what a shameless rewriting of history !, 但是这是多么无耻的对历史的篡改!
英语词汇的奥秘 ... jobless 无职业的 shameless 无耻的 sleepless 不眠的.

list.abs: 沪江博客 - 鲁西西的书屋 -... ... 1、外国人的船 foreigner-owned ship 2、烂污货 shameless bitch 3、赶上前来 come up nearer.
...shameless“无耻”，可指事物，行为，也可指人“恬不知耻”。shameless lies 无耻的谎言shameless traitor 无耻的叛徒
...th new eyes/regard sb in a totally different light寡廉鲜耻 be shamelessH
nobody can stand such shameless conduct ., 没有人能容忍如此不知羞耻的行为.

entry.tran: 无耻的;不知廉耻的;不要脸的
entry.def: If you describe someone as shameless, you mean that they should be ashamed of their behaviour, which is unacceptable to other people.

example.ex: ...a shameless attempt to stifle democratic debate.
example.tran: 妄想扼杀民主讨论的无耻企图

example.ex: ...a shameless hustler and dealer in stolen goods.
example.tran: 兜售和买卖偷盗的赃物的无耻之徒

means.word_mean: (人)无耻的, 不知羞耻的, 不要脸的

sentences.en: She is quite shameless about her ambition.
sentences.cn: 她对她的野心全然不知羞耻。
